ygData.subject: Introducing the Novelty Search Users Page
ygData.msgSnippet: To consolidate information on the subject and help those interested in exploring the idea, we are pleased to introduce the new Novelty Search Users Page:

To consolidate information on the subject and help those interested in expl=
oring the idea, we are pleased to introduce the new Novelty Search Users Pa=
ge:

http://eplex.cs.ucf.edu/noveltysearch/userspage/

The page provides in=
troductory information, links to publications from EPlex and from others, l=
inks to software, and answers frequently asked questions.  It also links to=
 a nice online visual demo at 
http://eplex.cs.ucf.edu/noveltysearch/usersp=
age/demo.html
that gives an intuitive feel for how populations behave under=
 novelty search.

The page is also now linked from the main menu of the EPl=
ex website and from my own homepage.  We are happy to take further suggesti=
ons and to add links to other publications on the subject of which we may n=
ot be aware.

ken
